You open your eyes fully awake to see you're not in your bed, but a giant crib made for your size, which has grown since you woke up. Somehow not only has your room changed, but you've gained weight as well. You note you're clad in bright blue feetie PJs as if someone dressed you like a little boy (even though you're clearly a girl), and you have all sorts of large baby toys for boys. You sigh when you realize from the soft padding feel around your waist and the crinkling you must have a diaper on underneath.

You look at yourself and estimate to be...
154.title: Waking Up (8)

choices: Your walking and balance seem ok, though your size makes it a waddle instead
You can walk (or rather waddle) but it seems a bit trickier and harder now
You lose your balance and are forced to crawl
1542.content:
Your grab your stomach and shake it, watching it jiggle before sighing again. You wonder of all things why it seemed like you were dressed like a big baby BOY. True, people have called you a tomboy before, but you didn't expect it like this.

You turn your head and see your enormous butt, it jiggling as you shake it a bit. You decide to try and see what's going on. You reach for the lock of your crib and you fumble with it a bit. Your fingers not only have gotten fatter, but they seem a bit more ciumsier and less dextrous. Eventually, you sucessfully get the lock opened and the wall slides down. You step out, causing your big belly to shake as you step onto your feet. It was then you noticed...
1542.title: Time to Bust Out

info.brief_description: You wake up one day to find the world changed and so have you, you big baby
info.description:
You wake up one day to find something really odd. Your room is now a nursery and now you're wearing diapers around a bigger waistline! From there, you'll find your world has changed. But the question is it just your world or the whole?'

There are two choices of the world in this interactive for choosing.

Choice 1: You're big and fat, wearing diapers. Your whole family treats you like you're a baby, even your "younger" siblings. You are not the only one, as your friends and potential love are also like this too. How far regressed is up to you, like whether you can talk or not.

Choice 2: Everyone in the world is fat and wearing diapers as the norm. However, nobody seems to get older than 30 physically. Everyone can talk and still work in society, but they have baby habits and desires.
